articles.description: On Saturday, Vijayakanth's son Shanmuga Pandian took to Instagram stories to thank all the people for paying their last respects to his father and being a support in large numbers. | Bollywood
articles.content:
Chennai (Tamil Nadu) [India], December 31 (ANI): People paid their last respects to DMDK chief Vijayakanth at the Koyambedu DMDK office in Chennai on December 29.
HT Image
